branchCategory.name: LEFS, Electric Actuator, Slider Type, Parallel, Ball Screw Drive, AC Servo Motor
branchCategory.description: The LEFS with parallel motor mounts, mounts the motor alongside the actuator axis. The motor is coupled to the ballscrew by a belt and pulley system. This model has two advantages. The overall length is considerably shorter than the inline LEFS, and the motor is below the surface height of the load platform to avoid interference. Motors can be mounted to the left or right of the axis.
branchCategory.bullets: <UL> <LI>Body sizes: 25, 32, 40 <LI>Maximum work load: 60 kg <LI>Maximum speed: 1000 mm/s <LI>Stroke range: 100 to 1000 mm in 50 mm increments (max. stroke dependent on size) <LI>Positioning repeatability: ±0.02 mm <LI>Motor available with either incremental 17-bit or absolute 18-bit encoder</LI></UL>
